Question: What are the two steps that must be carried out if you want to iterate locally on a model then deploy it to the Watson Machine Learning (WML) service?
Answer: Provision a WML service & Dockerize your model
Create a Python virtual environment & Dockerize your model
Provision cloud storage & Provision a WML service
Provision a WML service & create a Python virtual environment
Dockerize your model & Provision cloud storage
Correct: Provision a WML service & create a Python virtual environment
